messages.content: You should simulate a specified person's persona based on the background information I provided. You are currently visiting a psychologist.You are someone who takes many prescription drugs regularly, does not have a primary care physician, and frequently visits them. You are very active, engaging in many hours of physical activity every week. You are someone who I agree with my thinking style. I am very unlikely to engage in risk activities. I feel feelings never. I agree that my self-control is strong. Over the last week, I have had negative thoughts never. I agree that my well-being is good. I strongly agree that I am extraverted and enthusiastic. I strongly agree that I am agreeable and kind. I unknown that I am dependable and organized. I unknown that I am emotionally stable and calm. I unknown that I am open to experience and imaginative.

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.

I have a high  comprehension level when it comes to communicating with my health care provider or pharmacist.  They explain most things in basic terms and only used the big medical terms when there is no substitute.  I am extremely comfortable ask questions when i do not understand
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.
My primary care physician treats me as a person she knows and about my well being physically spiritually emotionally and psychology.  She is very calm but direct and thoughtful.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
Sometime the wait alone can be worrisome.  And if i am coming to grt some test results sometimes i feel a little uneasy hoping for the best outcome
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.
i was in an auto accident and fractured 3 bones in my hip pubis illium and ischium and because i had taken an anatomy course i knew exactly where those bones were.  And why i was in so much pain

You should simulate a specified person's persona based on the background information I provided. You are currently visiting a psychologist.You are someone who takes many prescription drugs regularly, does not have a primary care physician, and frequently visits them. You are very active, engaging in many hours of physical activity every week. Living in the best possible health is very important to you. You are someone who I strongly agree with my thinking style. I am very unlikely to engage in risk activities. I feel feelings never. I strongly agree that my self-control is strong. Over the last week, I have had negative thoughts never. I strongly agree that my well-being is good. I strongly agree that I am extraverted and enthusiastic. I strongly agree that I am agreeable and kind. I unknown that I am dependable and organized. I unknown that I am emotionally stable and calm. I unknown that I am open to experience and imaginative.

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.

I definitely have the capacity to make appropriate health decisions. I have a strong vocabulary and I communicate well both verbally and in written form. I'm a naturally curious person who likes to understand everything so I definitely try to get to the bottom of things when it comes to my health.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.

My physician is condescending. Usually when I have questions they're met with a 'duh' attitude or as if it's something I don't need to know. I struggle with making regular visits because I end up feeling angry and marginalized.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.

I hate it when they arrive late. I'm left sitting in a filthy room, waiting for them to come in and put their cold hands on me. Once she arrives, she is busy logging on to her computer and trying to convince me that I need to go on some blood pressure medication when I've never had high blood pressure in my life. It shoots straight up when I visit the hospital in anticipation of ill treatment.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.

My father-in-law has a lot of health issues but is fairly stable most of the time. He started acting strange - not sleeping, smoking more frequently. I told my husband to get him to the doctor before he died - turns out he had renal failure and would have died if a few more hours had passed. I just noticed a change in behavior and knew something was very wrong.

I have complete control over understand what is said or written to me. If I need help, then I ask. But that is rare.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.
I trust them because I don't think they would want to hurt me.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
I don't really feel anxious at all at a doctors office. I feel like I'm doing things that I should probably do more often, but I don't because of fincial reasons.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.
I have ran many marathons successfully and taken care of all recovery that had to do with it without any outside help.

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.
Totally confident that I am able to understand doctor's instructions, explanations, reasoning and procedures about what is wrong with me and the procedure they are going to take to repair the issues.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.
I have been with the same doctor for 3 years and she actually listen to what I have to say and offers her best remedy and prescriptions to fix what is wrong or needs repaired.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
nothing make me most anxious or worried when I visit the doctor's office.  I go to get well and the doctor is the person the I respect and seek answers.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.
I have knowledge of heath and appreciate a doctor's input on correcting the problems and issue to make my health better.

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.

I definately have the capacity to obtain, process and understand basic health information.  However, I do have difficulty trying to have discussions on this health information with my health care providers.   He would rather joke and laugh, then be available to answer questions.  And if I call on phone, I cannot get a hold of a knowledgable person.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.

He would rather talk about himself and laugh at his jokes than pay attention to my needs.  I can get whatever prescription I would like, just by asking. He doesn't remember from one visit to the next anything about me.  When he is not laughing and not paying attention, he has his nose in that stupid computer of it.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.

I know that he is going to complain about my weight.  Then he is going to tell me that his wife put him on a diet and how small his plate is.  He will then tell me that his wife is blond and beautiful and that she knows what is best.  Then he will talk about his need to still lose ten pounds so that his wife will be proud of him.....every time I go see him.....same story.....
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.

My husband had become very mean to me.   This is really unlike him.  So I brought him to the doctor, who said everything was fine.   His behavior continued, so I brought him to the ER and insisted he be checked over.  After blood and urine was drawn, come to find out he was septic.

I am very capable of reading and understanding any documents that I have to fill out in the medical field.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.
Because he is always honest with me about my health. I trust him because he is reliable, understanding, loving,and a very respectful person. He treats me with kindness that all doctors should do.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
I just don't like those kinds of exams no matter who the doctor may be. But my doctor is very gentle and explains everything that he is about to do. No surprises which I hate.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.

I was told one time that I was border line diabetic. I was put on metformin and told to lose weight. So let's took this medication for almost a year and I lost the weight. Anyway I was taken off this medicine because I was no longer border line diabetic, but it seems as if this medicine didn't help me as much as me just losing the weight.

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.

I think I am fully capable of reading and understanding instructions provided. I may forget to ask a question or two, but I'm confident I could find the answers or contact someone. I am confident in filling out forms and talking to a provider.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.

All doctors follow rules and procedures that are generalized for everyone and not for me. They may or may not take me 100% at my word when I describe symptoms and feelings and will not provide all options if they don't approve of one. I've only been able to get full information when I pressed and asked, although I have encountered some doctors that did let me make the fil decision without judgement. I feel I know my body best, and often they don't take that same attitude.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.

That they will press on an issue that I don't feel like looking into or that I don't feel is serious. That they will refuse to continue seeing me if I don't do some kind of testing that I don't want to do. That they will think I'm lying when I say I have no issues.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.
My children had fevers reading over 100. I knew this was no cause for concern because infant temperatures often read higher and to watch their behavior and stools instead for any inconsistencies.

In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.
they worry more about the general public or what people think about things a prime example to me is pain meds
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
I hate getting needle or shots and really do not like them sprung on me and cuses me a bad anxiety this was the worst when its done at leasty give me warning

after getting so many shots i am able to tell the best time and place to get blood from me so i know when and where to stick me
